name: Joseph H. REITER, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE OF PENNSYLVANIA and Governor of Pennsylvania

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
WILKINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Joseph H. REITER, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE OF PENNSYLVANIA and Governor of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
WILKINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Harry D. Shargel, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Susan J. Forney, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 934
Joseph H. REITER, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE OF PENNSYLVANIA and Governor of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 27, 1981.
Decided Dec. 17, 1981.
Harry D. Shargel, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Susan J. Forney, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
